response.name: Validation Errors
Validation Errors
response.body:
{
  "statusCode": 400,
  "message": [
    "address must be a valid Solana address",
    "type must be one of: WEB3AUTH, HARDWARE, SOFTWARE",
    "isActive must be a boolean value"
  ],
  "error": "Bad Request",
  "timestamp": "2025-01-18T22:30:00.000Z",
  "path": "/wallet/validate"
}
